			    MenuShow search box.AboutAcademicsCost & AidAdmissionsStudent LifeAthleticsAlumniGiveApplyVisitRequest InfoCSU, ChicoCurrent page:  Academics
                                        
    		Academics
    	At Chico State, our expert faculty work closely with undergraduate and graduate students to create innovative solutions to issues big and small, focusing on practical application with global impact. Confident, capable, and connected, Chico State Wildcats graduate ready to do and dare in their careers and lives.Find Your MajorDare to pursue your passion at Chico State. We offer more than 385 undergraduate majors and minors, graduate degrees, and professional certifications, so there’s something for everyone.7 Colleges, One UniversityCollege of AgricultureCollege of Behavioral and Social SciencesCollege of BusinessCollege of Communication and EducationCollege of Engineering, Computer Science, and Construction ManagementCollege of Humanities and Fine ArtsCollege of Natural SciencesGraduate StudiesView all academic departmentsA Support System From Day OneOur outstanding faculty create close partnerships with their students, fostering their talents and recognizing them as individuals. Undergraduate students work directly with professors on cutting-edge discoveries through programs like our Summer Research Institutes and Chico STEM Connections Collaborative.Earn Your Degree OnlineWe know work or life circumstances can make attending in-person classes a challenge. Chico State's accredited online degree programs provide the same high-quality academics and support, with the flexibility of live or asynchronous classes wherever you may be. Explore Online ProgramsDo and Dare at Chico StateEach day, class, professor, connection, and activity—every act of "doing" at Chico State—is an opportunity to truly experience the life you want to live, to build on it, and to dream bigger for a better tomorrow.Apply to Chico State100%job-placement rate for many majors$55Kaverage starting salary after graduationTop 5in the U.S. for study abroad studentsUsing Our Talents for the Greater GoodThe campus culture at Chico State encourages students to get involved in the issues that are most important to them. Wildcats graduate socially conscious, intellectually curious, and ready to make an impact and drive positive change in their industries and communities.Apply to Chico State60,000+hours volunteered annually by students125California College Corps student volunteers21Kannual CSC2 student summer research hoursCalendar of EventsCampus CalendarAcademic CalendarTake the Next StepsHow to ApplyLearn about Cost and AidSchedule a Tour(opens in new window)Call us Monday–Thursday, 8 a.m.–5 p.m., to talk directly to an admissions expert. No automated voice messages—we promise!Office of Admissions:530-898-6322  |  info@csuchico.eduWe acknowledge and are mindful that Chico State stands on lands that were originally occupied by the first people of this area, the Mechoopda, and we recognize their distinctive spiritual relationship with this land, the flora, the fauna, and the waters that run through campus.We are humbled that our campus resides upon sacred lands that since time immemorial have sustained the Mechoopda people and continue to do so today.MenuChico State HomeAboutAcademicsAdmissionsCost & AidStudent LifeAcademic DepartmentsAthleticsAlumniParentsChico FactsGiveResourcesQuicklinksCampus CalendarCampus SafetyJob OpportunitiesAccessibility Resource CenterAnnual Security Report (PDF)
We acknowledge and are mindful that Chico State stands on lands that were originally occupied by the first people of this area, Mechoopda, and we recognize their distinctive spiritual relationship with this land, the flora, the fauna, and the waters that run through campus. We are humbled that our campus resides upon sacred lands that since time immemorial have sustained the Mechoopda people and continue to do so today.Contact UsNeed Help?FacebookFacebookTwitterTwitterInstagramInstagramReport an accessibility issueReport a broken link on this pageTitle IXPrivacy PolicyCalifornia State University, Chico400 West First StreetChico, CA 95929Copyright © 2023 All Rights Reserved
